pages.text: In the meantime, you have come into possession of many new materials. It's time to take a close look at each of them to see what effect they have on your $(item)Potions$().$(br2)Your educated guess, as an expert: Awesome!

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Instead of $(item)Blaze Powder$(), the Potion Workshop runs on $(l:resources/mermaids_brush)Mermaid's Gems$(). The main advantage is that you don't have to fill your bottles with water before.
